casebody.data:
FORESTRY ASSOCIATION
v.
NCDENR, et al. No. 653A02. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 4, 2003. Craig A. Bromby, Jeff F. Cherry, Julie Beddingfield, Raleigh, for Forestry Association. Jill B. Hickey, Special Deputy Attorney General, for NCDENR. Donnell Van Noppen, III, for Sierra Club & Dogwood Alliance. Sierra Weaver, for Southern Environmental Law Center.

Motion by Petitioner to Strike Respondent's Notice of Additional Information Relating to Mootness has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of December 2003."
